__e: Les mauvais souvenirs qui me hantent se fondent près de vous, Maurice.
The bad memories that haunt me melt away when I'm with you, Maurice.

I'm always running away from the few memories... that torture me.
Les souvenirs qui me hantent le plus sont ceux où j'étais heureuse.
The memories that haunt me the most are the memories when I was happy.
